content.question: In the 1950s, the activities of workers such as those depicted in the image would be most challenged by

choices.label: a culture of conformity that emphasized domestic ideals for women
an increased need for dual incomes in suburban middle-class families
the rise of a second-wave feminist movement in the United States
the long-term decline of industrial production in the United States

content.answer: a culture of conformity that emphasized domestic ideals for women
